Package com.lonepulse.robozombie.annotation

Contains the set of annotations which are used to define an endpoint on an interface.

See:
          Description

Enum Summary
Entity.ContentType Identifies a specific format for serialized content.
Request.RequestMethod Identifies the method of a request as specified in Section 9 of the HTTP 1.1 RFC.
 

Annotation Types Summary
Async Identifies requests which should be executed asynchronously.
Bite Identifies an endpoint definition whose thread-safe proxy should be created and injected.
Config Identifies an alternate Zombie.Configuration which should be used on an endpoint for executing requests.
DELETE This annotation identifies an HTTP DELETE request.
Deserialize Attaches a deserializer for converting response content of an identified Entity.ContentType into consumable models.
Detach Detaches any inherited @Serialize, @Deserialize, @Async and @Intercept annotations.
Endpoint Identifies an interface as an endpoint definition and accepts the URI which can be used to reach the services offered by the endpoint.
Entity Identifies content to be included in the body of a request.
FormParam Identifies a parameter to be sent as a form-urlencoded list of name-value pairs.
FormParams Identifies multiple static or dynamic form parameters which are to be included as form-urlencoded name-value pairs.
GET This annotation identifies an HTTP GET request.
HEAD This annotation identifies an HTTP HEAD request.
Header Identifies a header which should be sent with the request.
Headers Identifies a constant set of headers which should be sent with every request.
Headers.Header Identifies a constant header parameter for a particular request.
Intercept Identifies an Interceptor which will be used to process a request just before it's executed.
OPTIONS This annotation identifies an HTTP OPTIONS request.
Param Allows a basic name and value pair to be provided as annotated metadata.
PATCH This annotation identifies an HTTP PATCH request.
PathParam This annotation identifies an argument which supplies a value to a URI parameter with the same name.
POST This annotation identifies an HTTP POST request.
PUT This annotation identifies an HTTP PUT request.
QueryParam Identifies a query parameter to be included in a query string.
QueryParams Identifies multiple static or dynamic query parameters which are to be included in a query string.
Request This annotation is used to identify a method which initiates an HTTP request.
Serialize Attaches a serialize for converting models to the format consumed by endpoints.
Skip Skips any inherited components which are defined on the endpoint.
Stateful Allows session management to be performed using Cookies together with a CookieStore.
TRACE This annotation identifies an HTTP TRACE request.
 

Package com.lonepulse.robozombie.annotation Description

Contains the set of annotations which are used to define an endpoint on an interface.

Since:
1.1.1

Author:
Lahiru Sahan Jayasinghe
